00001 #ifndef _BAYES_FILTER_UD
00002 #define _BAYES_FILTER_UD
00003 /*

00009  * $NoKeywords: $
00010  */
00011 
00012 /*
00013  * UdU' Factorisation of covariance Filter Scheme.
00014  *  Implementation of a 'Square-root' linearised kalman filter
00015  * 
00016  * Bierman's UD factorisatised update algorithm using Agee-Turner UdU' factorisation rank 1 update
00017  * Thornton's MWG-S factorisation predict algorithm
00018  * References
00019  * [1] "Factorisation Methods for Discrete Sequential Estimation" Gerald J. Bierman ISBN 0-12-097350-2
00020  * [2] "Kalman Filtering, Theory and Practice", Mohinder S. Grewal, Angus P. Andrews ISBN 0-13-211335-X
00021  *
00022  * A initial observation size may also be specified for efficiency.
00023  * 
00024  * The filter is operated by performing a
00025  *  predict, observe
00026  * cycle defined by the base class
00027  */
00028 #include "bayesFlt.hpp"
00029 
00030 /* Filter namespace */
00031 namespace Bayesian_filter
00032 {
00033 
00034 class UD_sequential_observe_model : public Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model
00035 {
00036 public:
00037     UD_sequential_observe_model (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_size) :
00038         Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model(x_size, z_size), Hx_o(x_size)
00039     {}
00040     virtual const FM::Vec& ho (const FM::Vec& x, const std::size_t o) = 0;
00041     /* Supplied model (h) for observation using state x, z allows normalisation and model variation
00042        Fast model of a single element (o) in observation model
00043        Precondition: Hx_o is conformantly dimensioned
00044        Postcondition:
00045         z(k|k-1) = h(x(k|k-1)
00046         Hx_o(x(k-1|k-1) = Jacobian of h with respect to state x (row o)
00047     */
00048     FM::Vec Hx_o;
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 class UD_scheme : public Linrz_kalman_filter
00053 {
00054 private:
00055     std::size_t q_max;  // Maxiumum size allocated for noise model, constructed before UD
00056 public:
00057     FM::Matrix UD;  // UDU factorisation of X with D on diagonal
00058                         // Lower triangle used as workspace
00059     FM::Vec s;      // Innovation
00060     FM::Vec Sd;     // Innovation Covariance 
00061 
00062     UD_scheme (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t q_maxsize, std::size_t z_initialsize = 0);
00063     UD_scheme& operator= (const UD_scheme&);
00064     // Optimise copy assignment to only copy filter state
00065 
00066     void init ();
00067     void update ();
00068     Float predict (Linrz_predict_model& f);
00069 
00070     Float observe (Linrz_correlated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z);
00071     /* No solution for Correlated noise and Linrz model */
00072     Float observe (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z);
00073     /* General observe */
00074 
00075     Float observe (Linear_correlated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z);
00076     /* Special Linear observe for correlated Z, fast Z decorrelation */
00077     Float observe (UD_sequential_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z);
00078     /* Special Linrz observe using fast sequential model */
00079 
00080 protected:
00081     Float predictGq (const FM::Matrix& Fx, const FM::Matrix& G, const FM::Vec& q);
00082     FM::Vec d, dv, v;   // predictGQ temporaries
00083     Float observeUD (FM::Vec& gain, Float& alpha, const FM::Vec& h, const Float r);
00084     FM::Vec a, b;       // observeUD temporaries
00085                         // Observation temporaies
00086     void observe_size (std::size_t z_size);
00087     std::size_t last_z_size;
00088     FM::Vec h1;             // Single Observation model
00089     FM::Vec w;              // Single Gain
00090     FM::Vec znorm;          // Normalised innovation
00091     FM::Vec zpdecol;        // Decorrelated zp
00092     FM::Matrix Gz;          // Z coupling
00093     FM::Matrix GIHx;        // Modified Model for linear decorrelation
00094 };
